original_body_lines: Election Commission Chairman R.M.A.L. Rathnayake said that the relevant instructions have been issued by now.
The 2024 voter roll registration was initially planned to commence from February 1.
However, due to the upcoming presidential election in 2024, the Chairman of the Election Commission said that a decision was made to expedite the related program.
The 2024 voter list registration will be available to the public soon.
